definitions.definition: The univalent NH 4 cation , derived by the protonation of ammonia
Any similar cation formed by replacing one or more hydrogen atoms with alkyl or aryl radicals

main_definition: ( inorganic chemistry ) The univalent NH 4 cation , derived by the protonation of ammonia
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry , especially in combination ) Any similar cation formed by replacing one or more hydrogen atoms with alkyl or aryl radicals
